A Multiscale tour of Harmonic Analysis and Machine Learning

To Celebrate Stéphane Mallat's 60th birthday

Where: Institut des Hautes Études Scientifiques (IHES).

When: 2023, April 19/20/21

Organisers: Joan Bruna (NYU) and Gabriel Peyré (ENS).

Registration

Registration is free but mandatory. Due to the limited number of seats, you should first preregister at this adress.

  • Freddy Bruckstein (Technion)
